thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Rapid7 Q4 Loss Per Share $0.30

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rapid7 Q4 Loss Per Share $0.30
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Rapid7 Inc:
* RAPID7 ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.17
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.30 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 28 PERCENT TO $57.7 MILLION * CALCULATED BILLINGS FOR Q4 OF 2017 WERE $93.6 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 44% YEAR-OVER-YEAR
* SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE, UNDER ASC 606, OF $50.1 MILLION TO $52.1 MILLION
* SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE, UNDER ASC 605, OF $54.6 MILLION TO $56.0 MILLION
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE, UNDER ASC 606, OF $0.22 TO $0.19
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE, UNDER ASC 606, $0.55 TO $0.42
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE, UNDER ASC 606, OF $225.0 MILLION TO $234.0 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE, UNDER ASC 605, OF $239.0 MILLION TO $245.0 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.17, REVENUE VIEW $57.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.48, REVENUE VIEW $240.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $55.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
